projects.title: AI Learning Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Design Your Own Courses Instantly
 -  React and Flask, connects to Open AI and uses RAG

projects.title: LLMs For All
projects.bodyText:
Custom chat bot creator released to all Microsoft Employees. Existed before Microsoft Studio Copilot was released as our external product
 - Led initial hackathon project, the built out with team
 - Ongoing support for teams using product

projects.title: Digital Twin Implementation
projects.bodyText:
Customized a bot to respond like me to potential clients
 - Trained on emails and texts
 - Used Open AI to host the bot

projects.title: Allergen Detection App
projects.bodyText: Uses a Large Food Model to predict the likelihood of any given food, hackathon project

projects.title: InPerson Swipe Social App
projects.bodyText:
- React Native Social App
 - Swipe on events your invited to
 - Data stored in **Firebase**

projects.title: Learn.AI
projects.bodyText:
- LearnAI, Save and Share AI Generated Courses 
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.
